attributes.action: Students should get their GCSE exam papers back?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Student should get their GCSE exam papers back along with the results in order for them to be completely satisfied with their result.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, and should comment on some aspect of government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
